I loooooooove this game. It does so many things right! It has a fresh experience that alot of the newer games have been lacking. The characters all have their unique charm (except my boy dwight who I find lacking, personally). The killers and survivors all have a very steep learning curves and I find myself learning new things every time I play another game. At first I thought this was going to be a weird spin-off of evolve but I was more than pleasantly surprised. The killers are awesome, the experience (for the most part) is awesome and the game look pretty good.

Pros:
-Nearly bi-weekly updates
-Amazing art style
-fun progression
-loads of replayability
-Addicting
-Great Characters
The list can go on.
but of course we have some bad parts too
Cons:
-No dedicated servers
-Meh loading times
-Games occasionaly don't load in fully
-The community is brutal always
This game is a ton of fun and I recommend it highly!
9/10

A really promising idea badly executed. 
I've held off on reviewing waiting for them to add the party system that should have been step 1 of designing a multiplayer game, but even now that it's in I just can't recommend the game to anyone.

If the killer stumbles across you early on it's a long, drawn out, un-fun death for you. 
If the victims know the level better than you do then you've got naff-all chance of catching them.
The levels are confusing and there's no map function.

Also, QTEs are never acceptable in any game, and dead by daylight manages to make even ingame actions feel like QTEs by requiring perfect timing of context sensitive actions. 

Really wanted to like it, but just don't.

《黎明杀机》是一款由Behaviour Digital工作室制作的恐怖游戏，这是一款有关杀手与逃亡者的网游。如游戏的LOGO所示，一名玩家扮演能力强大的杀手来猎杀四名逃亡者。
这款游戏的独特之处在于扮演杀手的玩家视角为第一人称视角，拥有强大的能力，还可以使用特殊能力来追踪逃亡者。而扮演逃亡者的四名玩家则是第三人称视角，可以更好地观察周遭环境。玩家在游戏中永远不知道下一步会发生什么，因此伴随着时时刻刻存在的恐惧来进行逃亡，玩家必须在强大的压力下做出决定自己命运的决定。

技能推荐
　　技能大致分低端局和高端局，鹰眼不解释了，快刀是为了加快游戏节奏，隔窗蓄力一刀常常能让喜欢溜屠夫的死在这里。鹿头为了方便找尸体。在低端局时，可以带上低语或者乌鸦来更方便的找幸存者。在高端局中，人类修发电机，偷钩子速度很快，一刀斩是翻盘神器，但是也会吓走幸存者。往往死在一刀斩下的人类拔线强退，分可能会不够。6秒见人可以确定人类位置，守住大门。但是也很容易被人类溜。
Ist ein echt gutes Spiel, aber mir wurde es nach einer Zeit langweilig :o

Увлекает до того, что ты не хочешь из неё выходить.
P.S.Лучше всего играть с дополнениями прикольнее

Es war ein gutes spiel aber die Entwickler bringen bei jedem update nur vorteile für den möreder früher oder später macht das spiel keinen spaß mehr weil sehr viele killer campen. Es ist eine gute idee so ein spiel zu erstellen es macht spaß keine frage doch bei manchen sachen versteh ich die welt nicht mehr. es kann doch nicht sein das man wenn man am hacken hängt vorher die falle nicht entschärfen kann. genau so das es zu viele hacken gibt wenn der mörder einmal das Purg hat wo er den festen grief hat dann kann der mörder dich über die halbe map tragen ohne das man eine chance hat sich zu befreien. Das spiel hat hohes potenzial aber ist meiner meinung nach noch sehr ausbaufehig. Das Hallowen DLC ist Interesant aber wenn man sich alles gut durchliest merkt man das auch das unfair aufgeteilt ist die Killer bekommen einen killer der drei Phasen hat wo er in der letzten Pfase One hittet und die Klasse die Entkommen muss bekommt einen Charakter ( den man wie ich bettonenn muss erst mal auf 40 oder 50 hoch spielen muss um die Purges zu nutzen die wirklich sinvoll sind) die schwester von dem killer ist eine gute idee aber das hilft dem Team überhaupt nicht weil sie nur Purgs für sich selber hat. Das bedeutet das der einzige Conter so zu sagen die Schwester ist von dem Karakter den man dann aber erst mal in umgerechnet 100 spielstunden auf level 40 spielen muss der dann nur sich selber und nicht dem Team helfen kann das ist wirklich traurig ich hoffe die nächsten Paches sind besser sonst wird das spiel immer einseitiger für den killer. Was ich aber an einer sdtelle lobend erwähnen darf ist das sie das lobby system wirklich verbessert haben fürher hat man fast ne halbe stunde einen lobby gesucht wenn man 3 freunde dabei hatten das ist heute nicht mehr so. Ich hoffe sie können mit der kritik umgehen und sehen das genau so weil das spiel geht aufdauer echt daran kaputt sehe ich so. LG Wener

Начинаешь его снимать с крюка, но тут подбегает маньяк и оттаскивает тебя от тиммейта. Тебя вешают, тиммейта спасают. После чего се чинят генеры и на тебя все забивают. Спасибо вам, команда.

Dead by Daylight is one of my favorite games despite the fact that you have to deal with some real assholes in the game. But they usually consist of killer campers but I'm starting to see not as many as when I first started playing the game a couple months ago. Overall, it's actually a fun game to play with friends and solo. I would recommend this game to you if you like going for challenges since each killer is unique in their own way. Another warning though would be lag, just like any other game and some glitches that may happen. A glitch I've encountered more than once would be when I'm getting something out of a chest and the item is in my hand but I cannot use it as if the game didn't register me grabbing it. (Usually happens with a toolbox or medkit from my experience). 
So, yes, I recommend this game if you are into challenges, getting chased, and if you are into Michael Myers (since he is the newest killer from the Halloween DLC if you somehow didn't know that by now.) The game is filled with surprises and always kinda encourages you to take risks with helping others or trying out new items, offerings, and/or perks. 
Hope this review has been at least a little bit helpful on helping you decide on if you want to buy this game and try it out or not! Have fun and good luck on winning as a survivor or killer! 

(Piece of advice (Killer): If you get the game and play as any one of the killers, no matter which one, PLEASE DO NOT CAMP. Also, if it ends up just being you and one other person in the game and it's a ranked game, help the other (the survivor) out because not only is it a nice thing to do but if you are a killer and just catch and kill the person, you'll go down in your rank from lack of bloodpoints. Just a bit of advice for you. 

Piece of advice (Survivor): Take chances such as saving others from a hook or if you even want to take a bigger risk, distract the killer from someone else. Or if you are on a generator and mess up a skill check, causing it to kinda explode on you, stay on it. Don't hide for too long, don't always bring in an item because if you die in the game, you lose it. Especially if it's a really good item. Try to always bring in your best perk(s) as well. The more you do in the game (by taking risks) the more bloodpoints you'll get and the higher in rank you'll get. Plus, it'll teach you how to get away from the killers and their tricks.)

Try to go inbetween of playing as killer and survivor because if you play as the killers you'll learn more about them and it'll help you learn ways of getting away from them easier and making it easier to survive when you play as survivor. I haven't played as killer except for once since I started playing and never thought of this until someone I met in the game gave me that bit of advice. Once you think about it, it's true. It'll help you out.

But that's all I've got to say about it right now. Hope this helps you out and I hope you consider the advice/tips I've given as well! Have fun killing and surviving out there!

Il gioco mi piace, ma ci sono diverse cose da sistemare a mio parere.
Gameplay: Il gioco è semplice 4 pecore che scappano e 1 lupo che le caccia :D. Il compito di queste pecore è di attivare quattro generatori e aprire il portone per poter fuggire. Quando sei di queste hai la visuale in terza persona e quando s'avvicina il predatore senti il cuore che aumenta di battito tanto quanto più si avvicina il killer ( a parte alcuni che non puoi sentirli subito ma solo vederli), il lupo cattivo ha la visuale in prima persona il che rende più difficile individuare le pecore, inoltre ognuno di essi ha abilità diverse (lo spettro diventa invisibile, il trapper piazza trappole, l'infermiera si teletrasporta, il mandriano ti oneshotta con la motosega e myers ti stalkera).

- Le mappe: sono poche ma belle, tuttavia ritengo che in alcuni punti bisognerebbe mettere più assi o mura per rendere la vita più difficile al killer.

- I killer : Myers (o come si chiama) è troppo OP, dopo averti stalkerato ti butta giù in un colpo, (normalmente un killer con l'attacco base non ci riesce), per quanto riguarda gli altri ognuno è sgravo se usato correttamente.

- Le competenze : Ogni killer o sopravvissuto può essere equipaggiato con oggetti che prendi con i punti fatti in partita e con competenze che anch'esse prendi nel medesimo modo. Queste ultime aiutano molto e secondo me visto che già il killer è OP di suo dovrebbero mettergli competenze un po' meno sgrave. (Magari sono solo io nabbo per questo la vedo cosi).

- Il matchmaking : Qua ci ho cristonato sopra, le partite le trova subito, ma le squadre... non sono bilanciate, sono  totalmente casuali. Puoi essere un killer di rank 20 e trovarti contro sopravvissuti con le peggio skill/competenze  di rank 1 e viceversa da sopravvissuto puoi trovare i peggio killer.

- Gli host: Poichè le partite sono hostate dai killer, se lagga l'intera sessione andrà a scatti ed è possibile che si disconnetta dalla partita. Nel peggiore dei casi scendi di rank e vieni fatto fuori perchè non riesci a scappare da quanto scatta.

In conclusione dico che è un gioco simpatico da prendere durante gli sconti per poi giocarci con amici, mette la giusta tensione quando sei sopravvissuto poichè ti senti una preda e ovviamente quando sei predatore ti diverti a sgozzare le persone ☺.

VOTO: 7/10

Game has vastly improved since launch, with nearly all the kinks out of the way. The game is still unbalanced in the survivors favor at high ranks, while the killer has no problem killing absolutely everyone at low ranks. I couldn't suggest a fix for that, but it's better than how it used to be when Meyers came out and killers reigned supreme. 

I wish people wouldn't call me a hacker for having less than 300 hours and having legacy, as though time played has some correlation to when you played, but that's just another way to show the toxic community. I'm a killer main, and nothing warms my heart more than getting survivors that will actually talk at the end of the match instead of claiming that I'm a shit killer because they died.

Even with the toxic community though, it's a fun game. Find a killer you like, and play them. Find a survivor you think looks cool, and main them. You'll get everyone's perks eventually through shrine and just leveling them. Leveling is much easier now that survivor pudding and party streamers exist, and BBQ & Chili is a staple on every killer for those sweet sweet points. 

I used to not reccommend the game, but now I'd say it's worth a shot. It goes on sale pretty often for 10 bucks, and I'd bet my ass that there's a Halloween discount, so grab it when it's convenient and give it a shot. Just prepare for the harsh learning curve ahead of you.

If you use NOED or DS, you deserve to never play the game again.

Dead by Daylight - это когда в команде 4 человека, но каждый сам за себя
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь союзнику выбраться из капкана, а в итоге маньяк ловит тебя и вешает на крюк вместо него
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты умираешь на крюке, а союзники в это время ремонтируют генераторы
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты ремонтируешь последний генератор, а союзник, убегающий от маньяка, приводит его прямо к тебе, и маньяк бежит уже не за ним, а за тобой
Dead by Daylight - это когда твое сердцебиение повышается одновременно с сердцебиением персонажа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты с оружием идешь убивать хейтеров (которых у тебя нет на YouTube, но ты прекрасно воображаешь их в лице игроков)
Dead by Daylight - это когда от маньяка можно убежать делая безумные петли по дороге
Dead by Daylight - это когда бегущий прямо - рак, нуб, новичок
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяку необходим двойник, которого нет, ибо ворот для успешного побега двое
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты следишь, чтобы жертву не сняли с крюка, а люди этим временем чинят все генераторы и бегут к воротам
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты отошел от крюка с жертвой на 10 метров, а ей в это время помогли сбежать
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь в прятки по-взрослому
Dead by Daylight - это когда поиграть с друзьями можно только в приватном лобби
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе наконец-то пригодились школьные знания английского языка
Dead by Daylight - это когда Dead by Daylight выходит раньше, чем "Friday the 13th: The Game"
Dead by Daylight - это когда фанаты Outlast испытывают оргазм
Dead by Daylight - это когда нет надоевшего всем раннего доступа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты покупаешь готовый продукт, полностью оправдывающий свою цену
10 из 10 игра!
游戏内容没问题，游戏的服务器垃圾的不能在垃圾。更新过后作弊检测的LOAD条都不读，还找不到解决办法，官方也不表态也不更新。游戏内容再好，运营方的客服及维护差的不能再差。要买游戏的人先想想一款游戏更新完以后你整整一周不能登录的感受吧。美其名曰反作弊检测，呵呵。

I love this game. The concept is fantastic. When i was a noobie survivor i loved crapping my pants when i saw the killer hunting me down. When i was a killer i loved watching halpless survivors run for their lives as i come to slash them. The ONLY main concern I have with this game is that it takes longer to grind in this game then in some MMO games. It is actually stupid how much time investment I have had to put into this game and I only have a fully complete Jake park and im barely gonna get a fully perked nurse with abunch of other half perked killers. 

The thing that pisses me off is the constant nerfs over and over and over for killers and survivors. Which makes this game more of a grindfest than anything else and that annoys me because I have a group of friends i use to play this with but because it was so grindy they all just stopped playing and when they were playing they would never wanna play custom matches because they didnt get any points to grind up. 

Overall i think the game is pretty fun and worth the money but if you are a new player a fair warning: YOU ARE GONNA NEED TO GRIND ALOT. I MEAN ALOT ALOT. LIKE SO MUCH POINTS.

Im writing this review now on 18th of November 2017. The game has now been extremely fun since its release and now the devs are not looking entirely at the money but more onto the side of fun and balance. Even though it may have a little bit of bugs, it sure is still fun as it can get! Atm, the game is abit fair now with its blood point system, such that camping is not advisable since one wouldn't be able to get that much points! Also, if the killer face camps the crap out of you(just by standing infrnt of person you need to save), just do all the generators so he gets minimal blood points.

这个游戏现在越更新越难受，只玩了不到20个小时已经想说拜拜了，首先游戏平衡性真的很差，对人类萌新满满的恶意，班主任出来以后更觉得难受。[strike]建议萌新玩人就直接进去找个电机疯狂爆米花然后等农场主爸爸来带你上树算了。[/strike] 玩鬼强无敌，四杀不是梦，[spoiler]针对有3d游戏经验的人来说[/spoiler] 那么好了，所有萌新一上来就玩鬼，一点不考虑主机的网络环境需求，猎空不是梦，每天玩游戏的时候只有三个疑问：我是谁？我在哪？谁在砍我？

你问我那到底买不买这个游戏啊?看见左上角那个猫头了吗，加我好友，我悄悄告诉你。

A simple game with simple objectives; what more can you ask for? It's definitely addicting and I cannot get enough! You attempt to ninja your way through the dark maps only to find yourself being hunted by the killer. What's terrifying is the fact that one of them is the imfamous Michael Myers! It's a one of a kind game that gets your heart racing each time.

With just about 700 hours in the game I feel like its time to write a quality review:
*Pros
- 10/10 game
- Would buy again and again
*Cons
- Wouldn't buy if you have a social life, or you plan to have 1 in the future

It's a great concept and is totally put through to the public in a fantastic game. Some ideas would be to make the game a bit scarier and to fix the bugs that are present. Another idea would be to add some sort of team chat to work together. An issue with the game is when your team can verse a killer that is way too unbalanced.

Best Horror Movie Similator Ever! 100 Thumbs up because you get to play as Micheal Myers!

First off this game can be loads of fun, unfortunately those times are few and far between.  In every single game for over a week if I've been hooked, I've been camped.  I don't run infinites, I don't BM, I don't teabag, I don't GG EZ the killer after a game, the other survivors don't dive bomb the hook. I dont do any of the things I see people using as an excuse to camp, yet every game they set up a tent and start getting dinner ready.  It's frustrating and bottom line is, it's just not fun.  I've been able to work past my input lag issues, the lag issues of playing against a killer half way around the world in general, and the garbage matchmaking that put that poor rank 1 Claudette in with me and my rank 20 friends against the rank 1 killer.  I'm so sorry Claudette :( I've given this game more than enough chances, but when it's no longer fun maybe it's had enough.
its pretty okay
